# Government Tender Announcement
**Tender Reference:** cb-606-32520280
**Tender Title:** Traffic Control Person Training
**Tender Status:** Expired
**Publication Date:** 2024-06-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-20 14:00:00

**Project Overview:**
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a supplier to provide traffic control person (TCP) training to its Quebec Region offender population. The training must be certified and recognized by the Ministère des Transports du Québec (Quebec provincial ministry of transportation) and the Association Québécoise des transports (AQTr).

**Requirements:**
The contractor must provide:

1. Certified computer-based TCP training recognized by the Ministère des Transports du Québec
2. Support documents and learning guides for participants
3. Orientation session for CORCAN operators on how to deliver the training
4. Examinations and correction of participant exams
5. Registration of participants and competency cards with the AQTr and CSC
6. Delivery of competency cards to CSC's Employment and Employability Program within 21 days of the examination date

**Work Location:**
The work will be performed remotely, and the contractor must not travel to CSC sites. The contractor must provide materials and exams to specified operational units as required.

**Criteria for Assessing Statement of Capabilities:**
Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that it meets the following requirements:

1. At least two (2) years of experience in supplying material to support vocational training in provincial or federal penitentiaries
2. Mandated by the Ministère des Transports du Québec and recognized by the Association Sectorielle Paritaire-Construction (ASP Construction)
3. At least five (5) years of experience in developing and delivering classroom and computer-based vocational training

**Contract Details:**
The contract period is one year from the Standing Offer award, until June 30, 2025, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods. The estimated contract value is $300,895.55 (GST/HST extra).

**Contact Information:**
Aimée Legault, Senior Procurement Officer, [aimee.legault@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:aimee.legault@csc-scc.gc.ca)

**Submission Guidelines:**
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in this tender
